snippet.title: Extinction Rifts Boomer Shooter Game
snippet.description:
Extinction Rifts is a retro first person shooter where your most powerful weapon is a punch with your bare hands!
The game is the latest project from QUByte Interactive and is scheduled for release in 2024 on PC, Xbox Series X/S, Xbox One, Playstation 4, Playstation 5 and Nintendo Switch.

Add Extinction Rifts to your Steam wish list: https://tinyurl.com/exrift

#boomershooter #fpsgame #indiegamedev #oldschoolgaming
